page.title: 20A Typical Day in Manuden 3
page.content: Two o'clock:some girls and boys have come outside to do Country Dancing.It looked very nice. At 3 o'clock there are lots of mums outside the school gates to pick their children up.The children are all coming out of school.When they got home they start playing outside.I can see someone playing a game on the Computer.At 4 o'clock the children are watching children's programmes on television at their homes.Some dads that came home early are coming home now.It is now 5 o'clock,lots of girls are going to brownies.Today the brownies are going up to th field to plant some trees.Now more dads come home. Now very small children are going to bed it is now eight o'clock and more children are going to bed.Between ten and eleven some grown ups are in bed, some in the pub. At twelve o'clock all is quiet.
